ReportText: EXAM: CHEST 1 VIEW HISTORY: Cough TECHNIQUE: A single portable upright AP radiographic view of the chest was obtained. COMPARISON: Chest radiograph [DATE] FINDINGS: Low lungs volumes are noted. Hazy opacities noted in the right lower lung zone. No effusion or pneumothorax is seen. Heart shadow within normal limits. IMPRESSION: Right basilar atelectasis versus infiltrate. Electronically Signed by: [[PERSONALNAME]] MD on 12/11/2018 9:27 PM #######################################
